bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Gender Recognition Act 2015 to make provision for single-sex accommodation in prisons; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Inscne a Aithint, 2015 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cóiríocht aonghnéis i bpríosúin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Inscne a Aithint (Leasú) (Príosúin), 2023

debates.showAs: Commission of Investigation (Nursing Homes) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a public inquiry into the management, in connection with nursing homes, of the risks to human life and health posed by Covid-19; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fiosrúchán poiblí, i dtaca le tithe banaltrais, maidir leis an mbaol don bheatha dhaonna agus don tsláinte ó Covid-19 a bhainistiú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Choimisiún Imscrúdúcháin (Tithe Banaltrais), 2022

debates.showAs: Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Foetal Pain Relief) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Foetal Pain Relief) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed)
Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Foetal Pain Relief) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for pain relief for the foetus in certain cases of termination of pregnancy; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le faoiseamh ó phian a thabhairt don fhéatas i gcásanna áirithe ina ndéantar toircheas a fhoirceannadh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Foetal Pain Relief) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Foirceannadh Toirchis a Rialáil) (Faoiseamh ó Phian d’Fhéatas), 2021

debates.showAs: Dog Breeding Establishments (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Dog Breeding Establishments (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enhance the welfare of dogs by strengthening the regulation of dog breeding establishments; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun cur le leas madraí trí rialáil bunachas pórúcháin madraí a neartú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bunachais Pórúcháin Madraí (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Civil Liability and Courts (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Civil Liability and Courts (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Civil Liability and Courts Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Dhliteanas Sibhialta agus Cúirteanna, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhliteanas Sibhialta agus Cúirteanna (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) (Pets) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) (Pets) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) Act 2001 to make specific provision for sentencing for certain offences in relation to pets; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Cionta Gadaíochta agus Calaoise), 2001 chun socrú sonrach a dhéanamh maidir le gearradh pianbhreitheanna i leith cionta áirithe i ndáil le peataí; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) (Pets) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Cionta Gadaíochta agus Calaoise) (Leasú) (Peataí), 2021
